name: @cloudflare/quick-edit
description: VSCode for Web hosted for use in Cloudflare's Quick Editor
author: workers-devprod@cloudflare.com

scripts.deploy: pnpm run setup && pnpm run custom:build && CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID=e35fd947284363a46fd7061634477114 pnpm wrangler deploy
scripts.preview: pnpm run setup && pnpm run custom:build && CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID=e35fd947284363a46fd7061634477114 pnpm wrangler versions upload
